name: Critical Move
description:
Play chess in a different way, a way more explosive!

Capture the enemy pieces with yor own while trying to avoid not getting caught in the explosions.

Capture enough enemies and the enemy king will appear.

Captureit! and you'll claim your victory

------------

Instructions

Move your king witlh WASD

Every time you move the enemy also moves

Cycle trough the different types of pieces with Q and E

Plant a piece on your position the will EXPLODE after three movements.

  • Pawn: will explode in a short "+" shape 
  • Rook: explode both vertically and horizantally until it encounters a wall
  • Bishop: explode diagonally until it encounters a wall
  • Knight: Explodes in an L shape around it
  • Queen: the perfect way to clean the board, including yourself!, combines the power of the rook and the bishop.

Enemies will patrol around the board  with different behaviors.

  • Rook: will advance on a horizontal or vertical  direction, and will change directions as soon as it hits a wall
  • Bishop: will advance on a diagaonal path and will change directions as soon as it hits a wall
  • King: will randomy move one square each movement, capture it and you'll win.
